meaningMnemonic: As usual, you can guess this is a verb thanks to the う sound on the end. The kanji means <kanji>frustration</kanji>, and unfortunately frustration tends <vocabulary>to torment</vocabulary> people. This verb is pretty advanced, but still useful to know!
readingMnemonic: We all know it's not okay to <vocabulary>to torment</vocabulary> each other. So how about we all <reading>sign a</reading> (さいな) contract saying that we'll never torment anyone ever again?
